title: patch 7.16
body: i started patching then it got stuck on 33 then i waited for 3 hours and still nothing after i closed it then it took me to the login menu then i played a game of urf then i said i needed to patch so i clicked ok then when i was patching it stayed on 33 again! help

replies.body: Someone must have flipped a wrong switch somewhere, cus I'm seeing quite a lot of these patcher loop issues happening over night. I've gotten word that everything should be fixed now, but definitely hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still having problems!
